resources.string:
The genesis  of greatness always lies in the vision 

 

The Avirat group is founded on a vision which seeks to usher in better tomorrow by providing people with improved quality of life and living standard . Recognize the basic need to approach the issue of planned development and growth across all the segments of real estate industry.

The main entrance door should be fixed on an auspicious day after performing Vastu pooja

North facing door should be in the left half when fencing the house that, is most towards the North - East , Avoid Placing door in Right HalfThe main entrance door should be fixed on an auspicious day after performing Vastu poojaNorth facing door should be in the left half when fencing the house that, is most towards the North - East , Avoid Placing door in Right Half

Q :  Do NRI requires permision from RBI to purchase this property ? 

A : No , Permission is required by NRI to purchase immovable property.
